attribute.description: The local address the server will bind to.
attribute.name: BindAddress

attribute.description: Time (msec) until a cached gossip member entry expires.
attribute.name: ExpiryTime

attribute.description: Max queue size of backlogged connections. Must be greater than zero or the default of 1000 will be used.
attribute.name: Backlog

attribute.description: Time for setting SO_LINGER on connections. 0 means do not set SO_LINGER. Must be greater than or equal to zero or the default of 2000 will be used.
attribute.name: LingerTimeout

attribute.description: Time for setting SO_TIMEOUT on connections. 0 means do not set SO_TIMEOUT. Must be greater than or equal to zero or the default of 3000 will be used.
attribute.name: SocketReadTimeout

attribute.description: Returns true if the router is operational.
attribute.name: Started

operation.description: The start lifecycle operation. Brings the Router in fully functional state.
operation.name: start

operation.description: The stop lifecycle operation. Close connections and frees resources.
operation.name: stop
